articles.description: Munawar Faruqui pointed out that Karanvir Bohra is not saying anything to Prince Narula because he is scared of him. Calling him a 'loser,' Munawar said that it was because of KV's behaviour, that he has never won any show in his life.

articles.title: Alia Bhatt in pink kurta set makes first appearance after wedding at Mumbai airport - India Today
articles.description: Alia Bhatt kept her airport look simple and subtle as she arrived dressed in a pink kurta set. She was spotted at the airport as she was leaving to shoot for Rocky Aur Rani Ki Prem Kahani with Ranveer Singh.

articles.title: Priyanka Chopra reacts to Vishal Bhardwaj saying her New York restaurant Sona serves 'desi food with a twist' - Times Now
articles.description: Priyanka Chopra thanked director Vishal Bhardwaj for visiting her restaurant, Sona, in New York City. The 7 Khoon Maaf director described the food as "most delicious desi food with a twist."
